protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein

reference.reference_text: Sun L, Gu S, Li X, Sun Y, Zheng D, Yu K, Ji C, Tang R, Xie Y, Mao Y: [Identification of a novel human MAST4 gene, a new member of the microtubule associated serine-threonine kinase family] Mol Biol (Mosk). 2006 Sep-Oct;40(5):808-15.
